body.bibl: Monferrer-Sala, Juan Pedro. “An Episode of the ‘Massacre of the Christians of Najrān’ in a Fragment at the ‘Mingana Collection’ (Ming. Chr. Arab. 246).” In Cultures in Contact: Transfer of Knowledge in the Mediterranean Context. Selected Papers, edited by Sofía Torallas Tovar and Juan Pedro Monferrer-Sala, 179–206. Series Syro-Arabica 1.
